description: Main entry point and UI scaffold for a Flutter 2048 puzzle game app, including app initialization, dialog handling for game outcomes, and layout setup.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application that sets up providers and app theme.

classes.name: _RootScaffold
classes.description: Stateful widget managing dialogs and layout for the main game interface.

classes.name: _RootScaffoldState
classes.description: State class handling dialog logic, layout, and user interactions in the main UI scaffold.

classes.name: _ControlBarWithConfirm
classes.description: Widget wrapping control buttons to include restart confirmation logic.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes and runs the Flutter app with 'MyApp'.

methods.name: _maybeShowOutcomeDialog
methods.description: Checks game state to display win or game over dialogs if applicable.

methods.name: _showWinDialog
methods.description: Displays the dialog when the player wins the game.

methods.name: _showGameOverDialog
methods.description: Displays the dialog when the game ends without a win.

methods.name: _confirmAndRestart
methods.description: Prompts user for confirmation before restarting or resetting game state.
